description: finally found a good note taking app in linux. Thank You.

"copy" to note opion switches back to unselected every time.
also, there's no "paste" option as I expected from a clipboard app. (it's probably not a clipboard app, just a note sync between devices.
summary: uninstalled. I probab;y don't understand what it supposed to do

description: Have been using it on my multiple Android devices for an year. Now it's synchronized with my laptop

Worst note taking app I have ever used. I have lost important notes due to random crashes. Also when you press Ctrl+Del, instead of deleting a full word - it deleted the entire note, with no possibility of recovery.

APENAS LO CARGUE EN UBUNTU 20.04 Y TRATE DE UTILIZAR LA APLICACIÓN Y TRABO A LA MAQUINA Y TUVE QUE APAGAR. EL DISCO DURO SEGUIA TRABAJANDO PERO ESTE PROGRAMA ESTABA ACTIVO BUSCANDO DATOS... ESTE TIPO DE PROGRAMAS COMPATIBLES CON ANDROID ESTAN HACIENDO DAÑO A LA SEGURIDAD DE LINUX. NO LO CARGUES. HAY QUE BUSCAR QUE LINUX SIGA SIENDO LIBRE.
no solo es agradable a la vista, es amigable y muy rapida 10 de 10
